mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notification( member_id, trip_id, expense_id, notification_type, sender_name, trip_name, title, content, is_read, created_at ) VALUES( #{memberId}, #{tripId}, #{expenseId}, #{notificationType}, #{senderName}, #{tripName}, #{title}, #{content}, #{isRead}, #{createdAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notification WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND is_read = false
mapper.update: UPDATE notification SET is_read = true WHERE notification_id = #{notificationId} AND is_read = false
